member.name: COPYDATASTRUCT
member.summary: Contains data to be passed to another application by the WM_COPYDATA message.

member.name: COPYDATASTRUCT.dwData
member.summary: The type of the data to be passed to the receiving application. The receiving application defines the valid types.

member.name: COPYDATASTRUCT.cbData
member.summary: The size, in bytes, of the data pointed to by the lpData member.

member.name: COPYDATASTRUCT.lpData
member.summary: The data to be passed to the receiving application. This member can be NULL.
